text: The year 2009 is the second year in the history of Shark Fights, a mixed martial arts promotion based in the United States. In 2009 Shark Fights held 5 events beginning with, Shark Fights 3. ==Events list== {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="font-size:90%;" |- ! scope="col" | # ! scope="col" | Event Title ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Arena ! scope="col" | Location ! scope="col" | Notes |- | align=center| 7 | Shark Fights 7: Sursa vs Prangley | | Azteca Music Hall | Amarillo, Texas | |- | align=center| 6 | Shark Fights 6: Stars & Stripes | | Amarillo Civic Center | Amarillo, Texas | |- | align=center| 5 | Shark Fights 5.5: Nothing To Lose | | Gamboa's Outdoor Event Center | Amarillo, Texas | 10,603 people in attendance. |- | align=center| - | Shark Fights 5: Outdoor Bash & Brawl | | Gamboa's Outdoor Event Center | Amarillo, Texas | Canceled due to bad weather. |- | align=center| 4 | Shark Fights 4: Richards vs Schoonover | | Citibank Coliseum | Lubbock, Texas | |- | align=center| 3 | Shark Fights 3 | | Azteca Music Hall | Amarillo, Texas | |} ==Shark Fights 3== Shark Fights 3 was an event held on March 14, 2009 at the Azteca Music Hall in Amarillo, Texas. ===Results=== ==Shark Fights 4: Richards vs Schoonover== Shark Fights 4: Richards vs Schoonover was an event held on May 2, 2009 at the Citibank Coliseum in Lubbock, Texas. ===Results=== ==Shark Fights 5.5: Nothing To Lose== Shark Fights 5.5: Nothing To Lose was an event held on July 18, 2009 at the Gamboa's Outdoor Event Center in Amarillo, Texas. ===Results=== ==Shark Fights 6: Stars & Stripes== Shark Fights 6: Stars & Stripes was an event held on September 12, 2009 at the Amarillo National Center in Amarillo, Texas. ===Results=== ==Shark Fights 7: Sursa vs Prangley== Shark Fights 7: Sursa vs Prangley was an event held on November 28, 2009 at the Azteca Music Hall in Amarillo, Texas. ===Results=== == See also == * Shark Fights ==References== Category:Shark Fights events Category:2009 in mixed martial arts
title: 2009 in Shark Fights
